title: The Case Solver
overview: The play is set in the turbulent period of the Republic of China in Shanghai. In a turbulent era, the forensic doctor Che Suwei and the gentleman detective Gu Yuan are intertwined with various forces. "Deputy Inspector Kang Yichen, and the innocent and lively reporter Cao Qingluo worked together to crack out a number of weird and curious cases, and restore the truth.
